Title: Add activity categorization and filters

Description:
Introduce categorization for activities (e.g., sports, academic, fun, arts). Add filter options to the activities list and map, allowing users to view only selected categories. Use color coding and icons for each category.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Activities have a category field
- Activities are color-coded and/or have icons by category
- Users can filter activities by category
- Filters work for both list and map views
